title: Starbucks Font
content:
Hey!

Does any one know what font does Starbucks use??

Thanks :)

Ofri

 [‹ Marvel City font](http://web.archive.org/web/20071030200926/http:/typophile.com/node/38420 "Go to previous forum topic") [The Cheers logo font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071030200926/http:/typophile.com/node/38417 "Go to next forum topic")
author: ofriafek

comments.content:
I believe the logo was done by Bruce Hale, an amazing Seattle designer. He still does a lot of stuff for the coffee pushers.

[http://www.brucehaledesign.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20071030200926/http:/www.brucehaledesign.com/ "http://www.brucehaledesign.com/")
